IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.update_bid') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.update_bid GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.update_bid @auction_id dbo.id_t, @zone_id dbo.id_t, @buyer_id dbo.id_t, @current_bid_money BIGINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Auctions SET buyer_id = @buyer_id, current_bid_money = @current_bid_money WHERE id = @auction_id AND zone_id = @zone_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
